content: **garland autumn 2024 is the result of the collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size ** one size **measurements ** 135cm / 53 long x 23cm / 9 wide **materials ** garland hobbii x pom pom 70% cotton 30% alpaca 105m / 114yd per 50 g yarn a hilma 2 balls yarn b sylvie 2 balls **needles ** 4 5mm / us 7 knitting needles always use a needle/hook size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 18 sts & 32 row = 10cm / 4 over garter stitch on 4 5mm needles before blocking exact gauge is not critical for this project but will affect drape and yarn usage **pattern information ** undulate is worked end to end each fan section shaped with short row it is completely reversible with no actual right or wrong side in the pattern instructions each wedge ends with a rs row then the first row of the next wedge becomes the new rs **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8 polish
